segments.text: Could you copy this document for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's my pleasure . How many copies would you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A hundred and fifty . No , wait , make that a hundred and sixty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . Will there be anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thank you . That will be all for now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your document will be ready in about ten minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
